mil6.2.3:1.2_0: “Vigatasatisammosā kho, mahārāja, arahanto, natthi arahantānaṁ satisammoso”ti.
mil6.2.3:1.6_0: “Kuṭikāre, mahārāja, sañcaritte, vikāle kālasaññāya, pavārite appavāritasaññāya, anatiritte atirittasaññāyā”ti.
mil6.2.3:2.2_0: ‘ye āpattiṁ āpajjanti, te dvīhi kāraṇehi āpajjanti anādariyena vā ajānanena vā’ti.
mil6.2.3:2.3_0: Api nu kho, bhante, arahato anādariyaṁ hoti, yaṁ arahā āpattiṁ āpajjatī”ti?
mil6.2.3:3.1_0: “Yadi, bhante nāgasena, arahā āpattiṁ āpajjati, natthi ca arahato anādariyaṁ, tena hi atthi arahato satisammoso”ti?
mil6.2.3:3.2_0: “Natthi, mahārāja, arahato satisammoso, āpattiñca arahā āpajjatī”ti.
mil6.2.3:4.1_0: “Tena hi, bhante, kāraṇena maṁ saññāpehi, kiṁ tattha kāraṇan”ti?
mil6.2.3:4.6_0: Yaṁ loke atthi samaṇānaṁ ananucchavikaṁ ananulomikaṁ, gihīnaṁ anavajjaṁ.
mil6.2.3:4.7_0: Tattha bhagavā sāvakānaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññapeti ‘yāvajīvaṁ anatikkamanīyan’ti.
mil6.2.3:4.8_0: Vikālabhojanaṁ, mahārāja, lokassa anavajjaṁ, taṁ jinasāsane vajjaṁ.
mil6.2.3:4.9_0: Bhūtagāmavikopanaṁ, mahārāja, lokassa anavajjaṁ, taṁ jinasāsane vajjaṁ.
mil6.2.3:4.10_0: Udake hassadhammaṁ, mahārāja, lokassa anavajjaṁ, taṁ jinasāsane vajjaṁ.
mil6.2.3:4.11_0: Iti evarūpāni evarūpāni, mahārāja, jinasāsane vajjāni, idaṁ vuccati paṇṇattivajjaṁ.
mil6.2.3:5.1_0: Yaṁ kilesaṁ paṇṇattivajjaṁ, taṁ ajānanto āpajjeyya.
mil6.2.3:5.2_0: Avisayo, mahārāja, ekaccassa arahato sabbaṁ jānituṁ, na hi tassa balaṁ atthi sabbaṁ jānituṁ.
mil6.2.3:5.3_0: Anaññātaṁ, mahārāja, arahato itthipurisānaṁ nāmampi gottampi, maggopi tassa mahiyā anaññāto;
